mapper.select: select ast.instl_id , ast.eqpmnt_id , ast.instl_ymd , ast.dscd_ymd , ast.instl_plc_cd , ast.instl_plc_dtl_1 , ast.instl_plc_dtl_2 , ast.instl_plc_dtl_3 , ast.instl_pic_nm , ast.rmrk , ast.reg_dt , ai.img_id , ccd.code_nm1 as instl_plc_nm_1 , ccd.code_nm2 as instl_plc_nm_2 , ccd.code_nm3 as instl_plc_nm_3 , vum.user_nm_kg as reg_nm_1 , vum.user_nm_ru as reg_nm_2 from ams_instl ast left join ams_img ai on ai.instl_id = ast.instl_id left join kgst.com_code_detail ccd on ccd.code_id = ast.instl_plc_cd left join kgst.view_user_member vum on (ast.rgtr_id = vum.user_id) where ast.eqpmnt_id = #{eqpmntId}
